results.definition: (photography) the act of assuming a certain position (as for a photograph or portrait)
examples: he wanted his portrait painted but couldn't spare time for the sitting

results.definition: (of persons) having the torso erect and legs bent with the body supported on the buttocks
a session as of a legislature or court
not moving and therefore easy to attack
the act of assuming or maintaining a seated position
examples: he read the mystery at one sitting
